author: George Bowden
title: French Nuclear Explosion: Authorities Say 'No Radioactive Leak' | The Huffington Post
text:
French Nuclear Explosion: Authorities Say 'No Radioactive Leak' Breaking news this morning. George Bowden Reporter, The Huffington Post UK HuffPost 
French authorities have reported an explosion in a nuclear power plant’s machine room but said there is no radioactive leak. 
A blast rocked the country’s Flamanville nuclear facility causing several injuries, the BBC reported. 
The incident occurred around 10 am local time (9 am GMT). 
This is a breaking news story and will be updated. Check back for the fullest version. Follow The Huffington Post UK on Twitter here , and on Facebook here . More:
